thread.title: Man disposed of body lice in UC Berkeley buildings | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Man disposed of body lice in UC Berkeley buildings | Daily Mail Online

author: Regina F. Graham For Dailymail.Com
title: Man disposed of body lice in UC Berkeley buildings | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Man repeatedly disposed of body lice in UC Berkeley buildings as he sat for 'hours wiping off' insects Students and staff members at UC Berkeley are being warned about an unidentified man who is depositing body lice in several buildings Email says the man will take a hand full of paper towels and a trash bin into a restroom stall where he wipes off body lice before depositing live insets into bin The email also noted that the individual would sit for 'hours' in an unspecified lounge area wiping off the lice from his body The school's 'pest management team has been called out over concerns about lice and that they've responded,' a statement reads No criminal charges have been filed, as officials say 'nothing criminal is involved' Published: 15:04 GMT, 23 February 2017 | Updated: 16:21 GMT, 23 February 2017 112 shares
